message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $16,000. I believe it will be very beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider letting it go for $14,000.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to exceed $10,000 for this product. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
